StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOCSClasses]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingTypeCode varchar(7), @FY int, @YearsForward int, @YearsBack int, @ClassIncrement int = NULL AS
SELECT C.CLASS_ID, C.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE, C.CLASS_NUMBER, C.FISCAL_YEAR, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.CLASS_BEGIN_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS CLASS_BEGIN_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.CLASS_END_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS CLASS_END_DATE FROM [dbo].[OCS_CLASS] C WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE C.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = @TrainingTypeCode AND C.FISCAL_YEAR BETWEEN (@FY - @YearsBack) AND (@FY + @YearsForward) AND C.CLASS_NUMBER = CASE C.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE WHEN 'OCC' THEN C.CLASS_NUMBER ELSE COALESCE(NULLIF(@ClassIncrement, 0), C.CLASS_NUMBER) END
